titleStmt.title: A petition presented unto His Maiestie at his court at Bristoll on the 7 day of August. 1643. By Sir Baynham Throkmorton baronet, high Sheriffe of the County of Gloucester, on the behalfe of the clothiers of the same county. VVith His Majesties answer thereunto
titleStmt.author: Throckmorton, Baynham, Sir, d. 1664.

titleStmt.title: A petition presented unto His Maiestie at his court at Bristoll on the 7 day of August. 1643. By Sir Baynham Throkmorton baronet, high Sheriffe of the County of Gloucester, on the behalfe of the clothiers of the same county. VVith His Majesties answer thereunto
titleStmt.author: Throckmorton, Baynham, Sir, d. 1664.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on pg. 1: To the Kings most excellent Majestie. The humble petition of the clothiers of Your Majesties County of Gloucester.
Identified as Wing (2nd ed.) P1851 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700", reel 2011, and as T1129 on reel 2046.
Reproductions of the originals at the Harvard University Library.
